page.title: 19MRS. MILLARD'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
MRS. MILLARD IS A PERSON WHO WORKS AT MILVERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL. HER JOB IS TO HELP AND TEACH THE CHILDREN. SHE LIVES OVER THE NAT WEST BANK IN THE VILLAGE. MRS. MILLARD GETS UP AT 7.00, AND HAS NOTHING FOR BREAKFAST EXCEPT COFFEE. AT 8.50 SHE WALKS TO SCHOOL, AND IS NEVER LATE. SHE HAS ONE BREAK FROM 10.45 TO 11.00. SHE TRIES NOT TO HAVE ANY SUGAR IN HER TEA, BUT SOMETIMES HAS SWEETEX. FOR LUNCH MRS. MILLARD LIKES THE SCHOOL'S LASAGNE AND SALAD. SHE GOES HOME AT 1.30. SHE LIKES SCHOOL AND HER JOBS VERY MUCH.
AT HOME MRS. MILLARD LIKES SITTING IN THE GARDEN. SHE LIKES PLAYING SOME SPORTS, ESPECIALLY SWIMMING AND BADMINTON. SHE HATES HOUSEWORK. SHE GOES TO BED AT 12.00, BUT SOMETIMES SHE STAYS UP UNTIL 3.00. SHE THINKS HER NAME SUITS HER.
